verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%>, A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%>. Deliver <S%H2502><s%> me, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, from the evil <S%H7451><s%> man <S%H120><s%>: preserve <S%H5341><s%> me from the violent <S%H2555><s%> man <S%H376><s%>; violent: Heb. man of violences
Which imagine <S%H2803><s%> mischiefs <S%H7451><s%> in their heart <S%H3820><s%>; continually <S%H3117><s%> are they gathered together <S%H1481><s%> for war <S%H4421><s%>.
They have sharpened <S%H8150><s%> their tongues <S%H3956><s%> like a serpent <S%H5175><s%>; adders' <S%H5919><s%> poison <S%H2534><s%> is under their lips <S%H8193><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.

Keep <S%H8104><s%> me, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, from the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>; preserve <S%H5341><s%> me from the violent <S%H2555><s%> man <S%H376><s%>; who have purposed <S%H2803><s%> to overthrow <S%H1760><s%> my goings <S%H6471><s%>.

The proud <S%H1343><s%> have hid <S%H2934><s%> a snare <S%H6341><s%> for me, and cords <S%H2256><s%>; they have spread <S%H6566><s%> a net <S%H7568><s%> by the wayside <S%H3027><s%> <S%H4570><s%>; they have set <S%H7896><s%> gins <S%H4170><s%> for me. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
I said <S%H559><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>, Thou art my God <S%H410><s%>: hear <S%H238><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of my supplications <S%H8469><s%>, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

O GOD <S%H3069><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%>, the strength <S%H5797><s%> of my salvation <S%H3444><s%>, thou hast covered <S%H5526><s%> my head <S%H7218><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of battle <S%H5402><s%>.

Grant <S%H5414><s%> not, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>, the desires <S%H3970><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>: further <S%H6329><s%> not his wicked device <S%H2162><s%>; lest they exalt <S%H7311><s%> themselves. Selah <S%H5542><s%>. lest: or, let them not be exalted
As for the head <S%H7218><s%> of those that compass me about <S%H4524><s%>, let the mischief <S%H5999><s%> of their own lips <S%H8193><s%> cover <S%H3680><s%> them.

Let burning coals <S%H1513><s%> fall <S%H4131><s%> <S%H4131><s%> upon them: let them be cast <S%H5307><s%> into the fire <S%H784><s%>; into deep pits <S%H4113><s%>, that they rise not up again <S%H6965><s%>.

Let not an evil speaker <S%H376><s%> <S%H3956><s%> be established <S%H3559><s%> in the earth <S%H776><s%>: evil <S%H7451><s%> shall hunt <S%H6679><s%> the violent <S%H2555><s%> man <S%H376><s%> to overthrow <S%H4073><s%> him. an: Heb. a man of tongue: or an evil speaker, a wicked man of violence be established in the earth: let him be hunted to his overthrow
I know <S%H3045><s%> that the LORD <S%H3068><s%> will maintain <S%H6213><s%> the cause <S%H1779><s%> of the afflicted <S%H6041><s%>, and the right <S%H4941><s%> of the poor <S%H34><s%>.
Surely the righteous <S%H6662><s%> shall give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto thy name <S%H8034><s%>: the upright <S%H3477><s%> shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in thy presence <S%H6440><s%>.
